651:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvatathāgatavikurvitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma |
651:2: samanantarasamāpannasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ ūrṇākośād raśmayo niścarati sma |
651:7: ākṛṣṭā ca svakasvakā sthānāni sanniyojya tat parṣanmaṇḍalaṃ buddhādhiṣṭhānenākṛṣya ca,
651:9: sarvaṃ ca grahanakṣatratārakāḥ jyotiṣoruparudhyamānā ārtā bhītā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ prajagmuḥ |
651:10: kṛtāñjalayaśca tasthure prakampayamānā muhurmuhuśca dharaṇitale prapatanamānāḥ ||
651:11: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarveṣāṃ grahanakṣatratārakājyotiṣāṇāṃ ca bāliśopajanitabuddhīnāṃ ca dehināmanugrahārthaṃ vācamudīrayate sma |
651:12: śṛṇvantu bhavanto mārṣāḥ ! devasaṅghā samānuṣāḥ ! karma eva sattvānāṃ vibhajate lokavaicitryam |
651:13: yaśca budhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ vajrakāyaśarīratāmabhiniṣpattiryaśca sasurāsurasya lokasya bhramatsaṃsārāṭavīkāntārapraviṣṭasya lokasya vicitraśarīratāmabhiniṣpattiḥ sarvedaṃ karmajaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ nibandhanam |
651:14: na tatra kartā kārakaḥ īśvaraḥ pradhāno vā puruṣā sāṅkhyāpasṛṣṭo vā pravartate kiñcid varjayitvā tu karmajaṃ sarvakarmapratyayajanito hetumapekṣate |
651:21: mahāyānadīrghakāloparacitakarma svakaṃ madhyakālapratyekakhaḍgināṃ svayambhu jñānaṃ pravartate |
651:22: paraghoṣānupravṛttiśravaśrāvakānāṃ hrasvakālācirādhirājyaṃ tenātyapravṛttidharmāntaraṃ buddhireva pravartate bāliśānāṃ vimohitānām ||
651:24: vimalaṃ mārgavinirmuktamaṣṭāṅgopetasuśītalaṃ karma eva kurute karma nānyaṃ karmāpekṣate ||
651:30: kuśalaṃ tat trividhaṃ proktaṃ punastantre pradṛśyate ||
651:35: tadeva aṃśaṃ karmaṃ vai pratyayāṃśe pravartate |
651:38: yathā hi śuklo varṇastu vyavahāreṇa prakalpyate ||
651:41: na tat karma vinā cihnaiḥ kvacid dehaḥ saṃsthitaḥ |
651:46: evaṃ dehe samāsṛtya karma dṛśyati dehinām ||
651:49: balakāla tathā yātrā vividhā prāṇināṃ rutā |
651:56: alakṣitaṃ tu sarvaṃ vai vighrakarmaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ ||
651:60: duḥsvapnaṃ durnimitaṃ tu duḥsahaṃ ca vināśanam ||
651:63: animittaṃ tena dṛṣṭaṃ vai tarormūle mahābhayam |
651:66: tena mantravarṇa tasya balāsau bhagnāśau namuciṃstadā ||
651:72: mantrarāṭ bhāṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ śālendreṇa jinena vai |
651:75: śṛṇvantu bhūtagaṇāḥ sarve ye kecit pṛthivīcarāḥ |
651:76: apadā bahupadā vāpi dvipadā vāpi catuḥpadā ||
651:77: sarve saṃkṣepataḥ sattvā ye kecit triṣu sthāvarāḥ |
651:86: yāni karmasahasrāṇi aśīti nava pañca ca ||
651:96: samayaṃ jagmu te bhītā uṣṇīṣo mantrabhāṣitāḥ ||
651:101: teṣa tulyo ayaṃ mantraḥ jinamūrdhajajā iti ||
